title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - NFL Week 12 Picks and Betting Breakdown, 'Fake Q's, Real Answers' on Belichick and USC
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - NFL Week 12 Picks and Betting Breakdown, 'Fake Q's, Real Answers' on Belichick and USC
description:
Colin does 'Fake Questions, Real Answers' on how his view of Bill Belichick has changed slightly (3:00), the biggest disappointment of the NFL season so far (5:00), the reason James Franklin and Mel Tucker didn't head to USC (6:00), and the big takeaway from the Houston Rockets' implosion (8:00). Then, The Action Network's Chad Millman tells Colin if his NFL Week 12 bets are “sharp” or “square”. They give their picks for Rams/Packers (11:00), Seahawks/WFT (13:00), Chargers/Broncos (16:00), Buccaneers/Colts (19:00), Panthers/Dolphins (25:00), Titans/Patriots (28:00), Raiders/Cowboys (31:00), and Jets/Texans (32:00).

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
